title: Strengthening Curriculum Development Practical Competencies: Mobile-Based Differentiated Language Learning Design and Implementation

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can identify at least three types of personalized language learning materials using mobile devices
Learners can design at least two mobile learning activities tailored to peer learners' proficiency levels based on differentiated instruction principles
Learners can demonstrate the process of creating and sharing language learning content using smartphones

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
